summary: Ship devices/ software to POA and Unified Settings owners
description:
Flash user software.

Enable hidden menu on device.

Ship devices. Transfer in the NASMS system.

Unified Settings & POA: Ravikishore Kantem (Flagships), Sonal Patel (A Series/ Tablets).

Sample shipping forms attached. 

Make sure to capture proper model name and IMEI. Copy Avinash in all shipping requests.
